title: Persona comments: Ask a persona to document/comment a code section
requester: As a developer using vscode-rhizome, I want to select a code section and ask a persona to provide comments, documentation, or implementation suggestions for that section, so that I can leverage expert perspectives while writing code.

stories.i_want: to right-click on a code section and ask a persona to document it with helpful comments
stories.so_that: I can get expert perspectives while writing code

stories.i_want: to ask a persona to provide implementation details for a rough sketch or stub
stories.so_that: I can leverage expert guidance to fill out code

stories.i_want: to ask a persona to suggest improvements or refactoring for a selected code block
stories.so_that: I can maintain high quality code with expert input

steps.title: Design interaction: what does 'persona comment' look like? (UI/UX decision)
Implement persona-comment command with prompt template
Insert response as code comment (language-aware syntax)
